root.name: Super Rub 'a' Dub
root.description: You control the tilt of a tub to guide the mama duck to the stranded ducklings scattered throughout the tub. Currents, gaps, waterfalls and windup sharks all stand between you and the exit.With 60 levels divided into three categories; fun, tricky and tough, Super Rub 'a' Dub brings new meaning to bath time fun. Try to beat the clock to score bronze, silver and gold medals as well as climb the leader boards and have your individual efforts recorded and online for all to see.
